review: We live way out in the country and a fast internet is not one of the benefits, 1 megabit/sec. I was not to sure about buying this device because we tried another movie service and it was a dismal failure. So, enter the Amazon Fire TV, simply, we just love it. With Prime, the shows and movies available are great. Add your own music line up to listen to music YOU like. Amazon Fire TV definitely a thumbs up for anyone living out of the regular provider area.
